text: A stranger sends you a direct message on Instagram, saying they are your age and want to be friends. They ask for your personal details like your school name or phone number.
Someone you don’t know on Snapchat sends you a message saying they have seen embarrassing photos of you online and threatens to share them unless you send more pictures.
A classmate starts leaving mean comments on your TikTok videos, making fun of your appearance. Other students begin liking and replying to the comments.
You get a message from someone pretending to be a famous influencer, asking you to click a link to join an exclusive fan club.
A popular student in your school adds you to a WhatsApp group chat where everyone shares jokes. However, they start teasing and excluding another student in the group.
You join a new Discord server for gaming, and someone in the chat starts sending you private messages asking for personal photos.
You post a selfie on Instagram, and someone you don’t know starts commenting about how pretty you are and asks you to follow them back.
You decide to post your vacation plans on social media, including details about where you’re going and when you’ll be back.
You are playing an online multiplayer game, and someone starts harassing you in the chat, calling you names and telling you to quit the game.
A teacher shares an online safety tip in class, advising you never to click on unfamiliar links or share passwords with anyone.
You decide to change your social media settings to make your account private so only friends can see your posts.
You receive an email from what appears to be your school administration, asking you to click a link to access your grades. The email address looks slightly suspicious.
You see a classmate oversharing details about their family problems on Instagram Stories. You are unsure if they realize how public their posts are.
A friend sends you a link to a fun-looking online quiz. When you open it, the website asks for your name and email to show the results.
You block someone on a social media platform after they keep sending you inappropriate messages, but they create a new account and contact you again.
